title: Marks, Events, News: migration to SQL
message:
Marks, Events, News: migration to SQL

Moving away from Realm, real-world app usage
can be easily handled using sql.

This commit introduces *2 classes that will be refactored
later and a migration tool that moves data from realm
databases to sql.

Realm backups won't be usable anymore

title: Marks, Events, News: fix recyclerview touch listener
message:
Marks, Events, News: fix recyclerview touch listener

Previously touch listener were refreshed each time the adapter was reloaded,
but this could lead to OOB exceptions or wrong item selection because
only the first itemClickListener added was used.
It's not possible to change the default one, but it's possible to keep
only one listener by removing it in an extended class to avoid such issue

Also move others recyclerview related classes to .ui.recyclerview

Signed-off-by: Joey <bevilacquajoey@gmail.com>

title: Safe: remove deprecated Crypto provider
message:
Safe: remove deprecated Crypto provider

SHA1PRNG algorithm is not cryptographically strong and
android N has deprecated it.
Remove its usage and workaround for JB devices.
For old devices (api 18<) this results in weaker IV generation.

More on: http://android-developers.blogspot.it/2016/06/security-crypto-provider-deprecated-in.html

Signed-off-by: Joey <bevilacquajoey@gmail.com>

title: Safe: security improvements
message:
Safe: security improvements

* Store key and salt in jni library, c is harder to reverse engineer than java
* Remove decrypted Strings from memory onPause()
* Always ask for password onResume() (unless it's decrypting or encrypting)
* Add secret option in settings to share encrypted password (only once), this will save some
  people who forgot their password and have everything stored in Safe only.
  **Anyone with Bold source code will be able to easily decrypt them**

Signed-off-by: Joey <bevilacquajoey@gmail.com>
